name: Apocalypse: Cockroaches Gives Me Buff
author: 叨卟狸
content: The ordinary superpowered adventurer Zhou Yi was abandoned by his teammates and met his demise in the jaws of a monster while clearing a dungeon. In his final moments, he lamented that he was no better than a cockroach. Unexpectedly, the God of Cockroaches took his words seriously and reincarnated him as one! In a world filled with monsters and superpowers, Zhou Yi, now a tiny cockroach, must strive to survive against all odds.
